        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama sobre el origen de Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword on the origins of Rome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel auf den Ursprung von Rom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé sur les origines de Rome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword nas origens de Roma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate sulle origini di Roma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο στην προέλευση της Ρώμης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama con preguntas acerca de los lugares, pueblos y personajes más significativos de la Roma primitiva.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword with questions about the most meaningful places, peoples and personalities in primitive Rome.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">origen</string>
            <string language="en">origin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel mit Fragen über die 
aussagefähigsten Plätze, die Völker und die Funktionseigenschaften 
in ursprünglichem Rom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé avec des questions au sujet des 
endroits, des peuples et des personnalités les plus signicatifs à 
Rome primitif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword com perguntas sobre os lugares, os 
povos e as personalidades os mais significativos em Roma primitiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate con le domande circa i posti, 
la gente e le personalità più espressivi a Roma primitiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο με τις ερωτήσεις για τις σημαντικότερους 
θέσεις, τους λαούς και τις προσωπικότητες στην πρωτόγονη Ρώμη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">origine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">origem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">origine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προέλευση</string>
          </keyword>
